data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: to be high/lofty, raised, name, attribute. samawat - heights/heavens/rain, raining clouds. ismun - mark of identification by which one is recognised. It is a derivation of wsm (pl. asma). ism - stands for a distinguishing mark of a thing, sometimes said to signify its reality.
data.sentence: The word السَّمَاءُ comes from the root س م و and is associated with the meanings: to be high/lofty, raised, name, attribute. samawat - heights/heavens/rain, raining clouds. ismun - mark of identification by which one is recognised. It is a derivation of wsm (pl. asma). ism - stands for a distinguishing mark of a thing, sometimes said to signify its reality.

data.meanings: Move from side to side, move to and fro, come and go, move round about, be in a state of commotion or tumult, to circulate.
data.sentence: The word تَمُورُ comes from the root م و ر and is associated with the meanings: Move from side to side, move to and fro, come and go, move round about, be in a state of commotion or tumult, to circulate.

data.meanings: Move from side to side, move to and fro, come and go, move round about, be in a state of commotion or tumult, to circulate.
data.sentence: The word مَوْرًا comes from the root م و ر and is associated with the meanings: Move from side to side, move to and fro, come and go, move round about, be in a state of commotion or tumult, to circulate.
